name: Lovely Seaside Studio
description: Located just few steps (20 meters) from the beach in Agia Pelagia and only 26.7 km from Heraklion Airport, this 26 square meters studio can comfortably host two people. It is well equipped with washing machine, fridge, mini cooker and oven, coffee maker and other amenities.

name: Sea Aura Apartment
description: Located just few steps (20 meters) from the beach in Agia Pelagia and only 26.7 km from Heraklion Airport, this 95 sq.m. house can host comfortably 6 people. Very close, in the neighbourhood visitors can find supermarkets, pharmacy, cafes, restaurants, bars.

name: Sougia Taxi & Minivan Services Vittorakis
description: At Vittorakis, they pride themselves on delivering transportation solutions that cater to your specific needs. Whether you prefer the exclusivity of a private transfer, the convenience of a taxi, the scenic route of a boat transfer, or the speed of a boat taxi, they have the perfect option for you.

name: Malia Cruises
description: Flexibility is one of the characteristics we value most. Each tour and experience is adapted to the profile of those who are seeking an experience. We offer boat trips, archaeological tours, safari, water parks, night time activities, town tours, theme parks, nature experiences.

name: The Greek Cook Out
description: Greek cook out bus coming from Chania area to Kissamos for greek night. Our outdoor seating venue is located in the center of Kissamos in an old cobble stone road. Come and experience a Greek Night with traditional cuisine, traditional Cretan dances, broke the plates, the opportunity to learn more about the history of Cretan food and culture, the opportunity to make new friends, the longest dinner table in Greece - 15,3meters. This experience is held at our buffet restaurant. The Venue was first an old Greek Prison and is now transformed into an experience to dance, enjoy Cretan cuisine.

name: Vittorakis Travel
description: Their goal is to make your travels memorable and comfortable, from the moment you decide to depart, until your return. Providing a complete package with all the services you need, you are free to explore some of the most interesting locations Crete has to offer without any worry. Trust in their care and choose comfort, convenience, and certainty for an enchanting voyage to the beautiful island of Crete!

name: Alina Rent A Car
description: Their offer cars of different categories, all of their cars are in excellent external and technical condition. They care about your comfort and safety. Located in the center of Crete, in the cozy tourist village of Ammoudara, in a convenient location near the capital of the island, Heraklion. Island Delivery: For long-term car or two-wheeler rentals, delivery to any part of the island is possible.

name: Chania Car Rental
description: Professional car rental services in Chania. Wide selection of vehicles for all your transportation needs. Airport pickup available.

name: Taverna Akrogiali
description: Traditional Greek taverna by the sea in beautiful Chania. Fresh seafood, local wines, and authentic Cretan cuisine in a romantic waterfront setting.

name: Heraklion Express Taxi
description: Fast and reliable taxi service in Heraklion. Airport transfers, city tours, and 24/7 availability. Professional drivers with excellent local knowledge.

name: Blue Sea Apartments
description: Beautiful seafront apartments in Chania old town. Fully equipped studios and apartments with stunning sea views, walking distance to restaurants and shops.

name: Heraklion Premium Cars
description: Luxury car rental service in Heraklion. Premium vehicles, professional service, airport pickup available. BMW, Mercedes, Audi fleet.

name: Sunset Taverna
description: Romantic restaurant with stunning sunset views over Heraklion harbor. Fresh seafood, traditional Cretan dishes, extensive wine list.

name: Chania Boat Tours
description: Professional boat tours from Chania harbor. Full day trips to Balos Lagoon, Gramvousa Island, sunset cruises, fishing trips.

name: Mountain Adventures Crete
description: Hiking and adventure tours in Crete mountains. Samaria Gorge, Imbros Gorge, traditional villages, wine tasting tours, small groups.

name: Allar Dinner Show
description: Spectacular dinner show with traditional Cretan music and dance performances. Enjoy authentic Greek cuisine while watching live entertainment in a magical atmosphere.

name: Bellot
description: Elegant restaurant serving modern Mediterranean cuisine with a focus on fresh local ingredients. Perfect for romantic dinners and special occasions.

name: Poliou House
description: Historic restaurant in a beautifully restored traditional house. Serving authentic Cretan dishes with recipes passed down through generations.

name: Compass Crete
description: Professional car rental service with a wide selection of vehicles. Airport pickup and delivery available.

name: Hermes Rental
description: Reliable car rental service with competitive prices and excellent customer service.

name: Rent from Locals
description: Local car rental service offering personalized experience and insider tips.

name: Mustang Crete Rent a Car
description: Premium car rental service with luxury vehicles and exceptional service.

name: Gia Panta Kalokairi Rent a Car
description: Family-owned car rental business with affordable rates and friendly service.

name: Fast and Easy Rent a Car
description: Quick and convenient car rental service with online booking and instant confirmation.

name: Citycar Rent A Car
description: Urban car rental service perfect for city exploration and short trips.

name: Villa Dio Petres
description: Beautiful villa with stunning mountain views and traditional Cretan architecture.

name: Villa Jasmin & Olives
description: Luxurious villa surrounded by olive groves and jasmine gardens.

name: Villa Zax
description: Modern villa with sea views and all modern amenities.

name: Casa George
description: Traditional Cretan house with authentic charm and modern comfort.

name: Cretan Family Taxi
description: Family-owned taxi service with friendly drivers and reliable transportation.

name: My Crete Transfer
description: Professional transfer service for airport, hotels, and tours across Crete.

name: Crete Taxi Driver
description: Experienced local taxi driver with extensive knowledge of Crete.

name: Liv Tours and Transfer Chania
description: Combined tour and transfer service offering guided experiences and transportation.

name: Heraklio Taxi
description: Reliable taxi service in Heraklion with 24/7 availability.

name: Excursions in Crete
description: Comprehensive excursion service covering all major attractions in Crete.

name: Wanderlust Tour Chania
description: Adventure tours and cultural experiences in the Chania region.

name: IMable Travel
description: Accessible travel experiences designed for all abilities.

name: Chania Sea Experience
description: Marine adventures and sea-based excursions from Chania.

name: Cretan Sailing Cruises
description: Luxury sailing cruises exploring the beautiful Cretan coastline.

name: Sailing South Crete
description: Sailing adventures along the southern coast of Crete.

name: Vintage Sailings
description: Traditional sailing experiences on vintage boats.

name: Fantasia Yachting
description: Luxury yachting experiences and private charters.

name: Balos Paradise Cruises
description: Cruises to the famous Balos Lagoon and Gramvousa Island.

name: Jet Boat Adventures
description: High-speed jet boat adventures and thrill rides.

name: Aroma Kritis
description: Traditional Cretan products and local crafts shop.
